duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and monitor social and psychotherapeutic services for patients and their families.
Prepare after-care plans and provide group therapy as assigned by the program manager.
Assist in program development, implementation, and monitoring.
Act as a mentor to case manager, group therapist, and social services interns/trainees.
Demonstrate competence with dialectical behavioral therapy.

education_certification.credential: Master's Degree in Mental Health and registration as an intern with Behavioral Sciences Regulatory Board (BBSE) or eligibility.
One or more years of experience in an inpatient psychiatric hospital preferred.
